[Ongoing Investigation](/Feats.aspx?ID=5949) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 108 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Vindicator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=285) (Level 4), [Lion Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=319) (Level 6)

</column>

---

You're always investigating what's around you, even as you perform other activities. You can move at full Speed while  using the [Investigate](/Actions.aspx?ID=2627) exploration activity, and you can use another exploration activity while Investigating.
